page.title: 11MILDENHALL QUESTIONNAIRE
page.content: {These were sent to each house in the {village, 50% were collected back again Modal no. of people in a house:{2 Modal age group:{22-40 Occupations were mainly{engineering Modal no.of fulltime jobs per house:{0 The majority of these jobs were{local {Less than 8%}were 2nd homes Modal length of occupation was{7yrs Most food was bought in{Marlborough Most people had come from another village within a{20 mile}radius {34%}of homes were bungalows Modal no. of rooms per house:{5}&{10+ {96%}of homes had a seperate kitchen {91%}had a seperate bath/shower room {98%}of homes had an inside toilet {57%}were owner occupied,{15%}rented privately,{25%}local authority rented Modal age of houses:{11-50 years {Over 1/2}villagers do not use the bus service.Those that do,use it{weekly.
